title: Historic Blue Mountains Escape
description: Escape to the world heritage-listed Blue Mountains staying two nights/three days at the historical Palais Royale - only minutes from the region's famous sites including the Three Sisters at Echo Point and Scenic World. Enjoy daily continental buffet breakfasts, a serving of port by the fireplace on arrival, late checkout and more for two.
offer_address: 230 Katoomba St, Katoomba NSW 2780

title: Boutique Blue Mountains Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Chef-Hatted High Tea
description:
Leave it all behind for the impressive natural beauty of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Blue Mountains with a stay at the boutique Parklands Country Gardens and Lodges - a romantic destination less than two hours from Sydney. Housed in a beautifully renovated heritage building, surrounded by acres of perfectly kept gardens reminiscent of a grand European estate, this secluded retreat is the perfect destination in which to relax and explore the Blue Mountains National Park in pure luxury.

Days at Parklands Country Gardens and Lodges can be spent discovering the national park, including the famous Three Sisters and Govetts Leap lookout, being pampered with spa treatments and embracing the tranquil atmosphere of this unique part of Australia. With a collection of just 28 spacious guestrooms spread across seven garden cottages, a stay at Parklands Country Gardens and Lodges will allow you to be at one with nature and unwind surrounded by the untouched beauty of the Blue Mountains.
offer_address: 132 Govetts Leap Road, Blackheath, New South Wales 2785, Australia

title: Iconic Blue Mountains Heritage Escape with Daily Sparkling Wine Breakfast & A$100 Dining Credit
description:
Experience Art Deco-inspired luxury, award-winning dining and timeless heritage design at this historic retreat in the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Blue Mountains. Just a short drive from the iconic Three Sisters at Echo Point and the Scenic Skyway cable car, this spectacular getaway promises a blend of elegance and nature.

A local institution since 1904, the hotel has attracted many a famous guest, including Australia's first Prime Minister Sir Edmund Barton and Sherlock Holmes creator, Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. Experience this grand history stay with grander inclusions, including A$100 credit to spend at venues like chef-hatted The Wintergarden.

Learn about the estate and magnate founder Mark Foy's illustrious heritage on an intimate tour of the grounds, from the century-old Casino Lobby and its iconic domed roof to the Majestic Ballroom. Plus, with a perfect position in the town of Medlow Bath - just over 90 minutes by car from Sydney - you're surrounded by the spectacular scenery of the Blue Mountains, making it the perfect romantic weekend escape.
offer_address: 52-88 Great Western Highway, Medlow Bath, New South Wales 2780, Australia

title: Boutique Blue Mountains Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Guided Hydro Majestic Hotel Tour
description:
Leave it all behind for the impressive natural beauty of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Blue Mountains with a stay at the boutique Parklands Country Gardens and Lodges - a romantic destination less than two hours' drive from Sydney. Housed in a beautifully renovated, heritage-listed building, surrounded by acres of perfectly kept gardens reminiscent of a grand European estate, this secluded retreat is the perfect destination in which to relax and explore the Blue Mountains National Park in pure luxury

Ideally located within the Blue Mountains World Heritage Area, days at Parklands Country Gardens and Lodge can be spent discovering the national park, including the famous Three Sisters and Govetts Leap lookout, being pampered with spa treatments and embracing the tranquil atmosphere of this unique part of Australia.

For the ultimate Blue Mountains experience, choose the High Tea Upgrade - offering you the chance of indulging in an exquisite standard high tea at the chef-hatted The Wintergarden at The Hydro Majestic Hotel
offer_address: 132 Govetts Leap Road, Blackheath, New South Wales 2785, Australia

vendor_name: Lilianfels Blue Mountains Resort and Spa
title: Five-Star Blue Mountains Retreat with Daily A$50 Dining Credit, Sparkling Wine Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Proudly perched atop rolling canyons, the five-star Lilianfels Blue Mountains Resort and Spa offers guests privileged views of New South Wales' UNESCO World Heritage-listed Blue Mountains National Park. Just a five-minute stroll from the Three Sisters viewing platform, this is the ultimate romantic retreat package, with A$50 daily dining credit, daily sparkling wine with breakfast, nightly cocktails and chocolate strawberries on arrival. Find reprieve from the stresses of everyday life with a soul-soothing treatment at Lilianfels Spa, float weightlessly in the heated indoor pool or dine, sip and sample decadent cuisine at any of the resort's onsite dining options, including the award-winning Darley's Restaurant & Bar and the chef-hatted Echoes Restaurant.

Be enveloped by a world of sophistication and impeccable service, with beautifully appointed accommodations only surpassed by the breathtaking views over Jamison Valley. Just 90 minutes from Sydney, this haven of tranquillity is so close yet feels worlds away from the everyday. Spend your days chasing rushing waterfalls, camping beneath the stars or setting out on one of the 140 kilometres of walking tracks that wind through native bushland.
location_description: Lilianfels Resort and Spa - Blue Mountains
offer_address: 5-19 Lilianfels Avenue, Katoomba 2780, New South Wales, Australia

vendor_name: Fairmont Resort & Spa Blue Mountains - MGallery by Sofitel
title: Blue Mountains MGallery by Sofitel Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Wine
description:
Escape to the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Blue Mountains National Park, staying amid the eucalyptus-bound hills of the Jamison Valley at Fairmont Resort & Spa Blue Mountains - MGallery by Sofitel, one of New South Wales' favourite boutique designer hotels.

Just a 90-minute drive from Sydney, this beautiful resort is exemplary of MGallery by Sofitel sophistication and service. Discover a haven of serenity where mountains, plateaus and escarpments extend as far as the eye can see, the Three Sisters and Scenic World are practically at your doorstep and world-class facilities abound: plunge into the two pools, get lost in the outdoor hedge maze, catch a movie in the auditorium cinema and savour farm-to-plate dining in Eucalypt Grill.
location_description: Fairmont Resort Blue Mountains by MGallery
offer_address: 1 Sublime Point Road, Leura 2780, New South Wales, Australia

title: Charming Blue Mountains Heritage Manor Escape with Daily Breakfast
description: Hotel Etico is a lovely heritage manor escape, pairing the cosy atmosphere of Mount Victoria with the incredible natural beauty of the Blue Mountains. At Australia’s first social enterprise hotel, backed by a trainee program supporting people with intellectual disability, you'll start each morning with a thoughtful breakfast box, before taking your time to explore the region. Make the most of the countless walking tracks and mountain lookouts nearby, including a selection of gorgeous waterfalls just a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Return to the hotel for an evening of relaxation; snuggle up in front of one of the fireplaces, visit the library and relax.
offer_address: 11 Montgomery Street, Mount Victoria 2786, New South Wales, Australia

title: Boutique Countryside Farm Stay, Just a Short Drive from Sydney
description: Soak up the majestic beauty of the Blue Mountains, NSW, on a charming countryside escape to Blueberry Hills on Comleroy. Chill out in cosy and comfortable self-contained accommodation, by the outdoor fireplace or in the outdoor hot tub as you soak up sweeping countryside views. Your escape includes a daily continental breakfast hamper packed with eggs, bread, cereals, ham, cheese, pastries, juice and more, a complimentary bottle of red or white wine to share and guaranteed late checkout at 11am.
offer_address: 464 Comleroy Rd, Kurrajong, NSW 2758

vendor_name: Fairmont Resort & Spa Blue Mountains - MGallery by Sofitel

vendor_name: Fairmont Resort & Spa Blue Mountains - MGallery by Sofitel
title: Blue Mountains Boutique MGallery Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Guaranteed Upgrade & Spectacular Views
description:
Escape to the eucalyptus-clad hills, secret caves and spectacular sandstone lookouts of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Blue Mountains National Park with a stay at Fairmont Resort Blue Mountains by MGallery, perfectly placed in the bushwalk-blessed Jamison Valley. Just a 90-minute drive from Sydney, this expansive resort is a haven of serenity where you can refresh yourself in one of two pools and savour six exceptional dining venues: cosy up by the fireplace at Embers Restaurant, laze through the day at Sublime Lounge and enjoy classic cocktails served with an Australian twist at Two Doctors Whiskey Tavern, cunningly hidden in the resort's basement.

Golfers will enjoy being within an easy stroll of the historic Leura Golf Club, Blue Mountains' original and oldest green, while those seeking holistic wellness treatments will find no better than at the onsite, world-class Ubika Day Spa. Then, of course, there are the outdoor gardens offering views as far as the eye can see, across ancient mountains, plateaus and escarpments.
location_description: Fairmont Resort Blue Mountains by MGallery
offer_address: 1 Sublime Point Road, Leura 2780, New South Wales, Australia

title: Blue Mountains Boutique Retreat with Daily Country Breakfast
description:

Housed in a beautifully renovated heritage-listed building set on acres of perfectly kept gardens reminiscent of a grand European estate, this secluded retreat is the perfect destination to unwind, relax and explore the beauty of the Blue Mountains National Park in luxury and style.

Your escape includes a daily country breakfast basket delivered to your room, a bottle of wine when you dine at the award-winning restaurant The Wintergarden - housed in one of Australia’s most iconic historical hotels, The Hydro Majestic - an A$50 spa credit for relaxing spa treatments and an exclusive guided tour of The Hydro Majestic.
offer_address: 132 Govetts Leap Road, Blackheath, New South Wales 2785, Australia

title: Grand Opening: Chalet Luxury in the Heart of the Blue Mountains with Moët & Chandon Champagne Picnic
description:
Discover the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Blue Mountains from Chalets at Blackheath, part of the esteemed Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection. Offering five-star, eco-friendly luxury, this newly opened, boutique property houses four charming chalets, each designed to celebrate native Australian bushland. Experience country elegance and cosy nights in front of the open fire, relax with a good book in hand in the communal onsite library and explore the magical surroundings.

With elegant, modern accommodations designed with local textures and lush comforts, oversized bathrooms with soaking tubs and a private sundeck among the Australian bushland, there's no better place to reconnect with Mother Nature while soaking up the tranquil views.
offer_address: 394 Evans Lookout Road, Blackheath New South Wales 2785

title: Iconic Blue Mountains Escape with Daily Breakfast & Chef-Hatted High Tea
description:
**New dates added, available for a limited time only**  

Immerse yourself in Art Deco-inspired luxury, chef-hatted dining and heritage design with an unforgettable stay at the historic The Hydro Majestic Hotel - a spectacular retreat just a short drive from the region's famous sites, including the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Blue Mountains, the Three Sisters at Echo Point and Scenic Skyway cablecar. This iconic Art Deco property has graced the region since 1904 and attracted famous guests, including Australia's first Prime Minister Sir Edmund Barton and Sherlock Holmes creator, Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. Experience this slice of history with a grand heritage stay and grander inclusions, including a legendary high tea at the chef-hatted restaurant, The Wintergarden.

This elegant property is perfectly positioned in the historic town of Medlow Bath - just over 90 minutes by car from Sydney - in the heart of the spectacular scenery of the Blue Mountains, making it perfect for a romantic weekend escape.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Wake up to a delicious daily breakfast with traditional classics
- Enjoy an unforgettable standard high-tea experience with sweet and savoury favourites at the chef-hatted restaurant, The Wintergarden
- Embark on a guided tour of the hotel and discover its spectacular ballroom and heritage interiors
- Sip one glass of sparkling wine per adult when you purchase a three-course dining experience at The Wintergarden, Echoes Restaurant & Bar or Darley's Restaurant

**Looking for extra luxury?** Elevate your stay with an upgrade to the most luxurious suite in the property, the Executive Valley View Room, featuring a decorative marbled ensuite bathroom with gold trims and a romantic sunken spa bath.
offer_address: 52-88 Great Western Highway, Medlow Bath, New South Wales 2780, Australia

Enjoy the intimacy of this unique hosted abode, indulge in delicious country-style cuisine with the table d’hote dinner service, curl up in front of the fire in winter or enjoy a springtime picnic under a shady gum tree.

title: Idyllic Blue Mountains Retreat in Capertee Valley
description:
Framed by the soul-stirring Blue Mountains peaks and 100 acres of tree-lined pastures, Belle Bois offers boutique country elegance. Overlooking one of the largest canyons in the world, this is an idyllic retreat ensconced in the Australian wilds.

Sink into absolute comfort in your spacious suite with sweeping Blue Mountains vistas, as you revel in relaxation from sunrise to sunset. Enjoy the intimacy of this unique abode and indulge in delicious country-style table d'hôte dining, curl up in front of the fire in winter or enjoy a springtime picnic under the shade of a tree. Take some time to explore Capertee Valley's breathtaking surrounds on a bushwalk before plunging into the cool waters at Ganguddy, or enjoy a leisurely drive through a backdrop of sweeping farmland and spectacular canyon cliffs, stopping by farm gates and cellar doors en route. Located only 3.5 hours' drive from Sydney and Newcastle, this country retreat feels a million miles from city life.
offer_address: 11 Brymair Road, Bogee, New South Wales 2849, Australia

title: Adults-Only Spicers Blue Mountains All-Inclusive Eco-Retreat with Just Eight Luxury Suites
description:
Let the magic of the Blue Mountains take hold when you stay at the five-star Spicers Sangoma Retreat, an all-inclusive forest sanctuary that harnesses the calming effects of nature. Be romanced by soaring views of the Nepean River as you discover the hidden indulgences of the ultra-private suites, each boasting treehouse-style luxury. Rest and relax in the main lounge, where a mosaic of animal hide ottomans, tribal artwork and rustic wooden furnishings arouses curiosity, with a backdrop of birdsong and bushland, ever-present thanks to floor-to-ceiling windows.

Celebrated chefs take you on a culinary journey every evening at the sophisticated Restaurant Amara, where a degustation menu is inspired by a daily harvest, all sourced from within an hour's radius. Once you've tasted the region's bounty, deepen your connection to the local area with a range of recreational activities, including private abseiling, canyoning, hiking and mountain biking adventures.
